alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 11:17PM MDT until June 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN BUTTE AND PERKINS COUNTIES... At 1116 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Shadehill Reservoir to 7 miles north of Date to 4 miles east of Sheep Buttes to 7 miles west of Mud Butte, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lemmon, Bison, Meadow, Chance, Lodgepole, White Butte, Usta, Shadehill, Date, Zeona, Prairie City, Owen Lake, Sheep Buttes, Arrow Head Buttes, Shadehill Reservoir and southeastern Slim Buttes. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing widespread damaging winds. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
